team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet our professional coaches
team.emptySection: Coaches section is not filled in CMS
team.founderDesc1: Alexey founded ALTIUS in 2010 with the vision to develop badminton in Moldova. His professional approach and dedication have helped hundreds of students achieve their goals.
team.founderDesc2: Under his leadership, the club has become one of Chisinau's leading training centers, known for high-quality coaching and a friendly atmosphere.
team.founderQuote: Every student is unique. Our goal is to help everyone reach their full potential in badminton.

0.name: Elena Petrova

strategy.title: ALTIUS Badminton Club Development Strategy 2025 ‚Äì 2030

mission.title: Introduction and Club Mission
mission.text1: ALTIUS is a modern badminton club created to develop the sport at all levels: from children's first steps to international victories of professionals. Our mission is to make badminton a mass, accessible and prestigious sport in Moldova, forming a strong community of athletes, coaches and fans.
mission.text2: We believe that through sport we can cultivate character, discipline and the pursuit of high results. Altius strives to become the leading badminton development center in the country and one of the recognized clubs in Eastern Europe.

currentState.title: Current State and Potential
currentState.intro: Today Altius already has a solid foundation:
points: modern training hall in Chisinau
experienced coaches and motivated athletes
participation in national and international competitions
growing community of enthusiasts and children starting badminton
currentState.conclusion: However, the club's potential is much greater. Badminton in Moldova is at a growth stage, and Altius can become the leader of this movement, setting standards and forming an entire ecosystem of sports development.

goals.title: Strategic Goals for 2025 ‚Äì 2030
items: Create a leading athlete training center in the country and bring them to the international level
Make badminton a mass sport among children, teenagers and adults
Expand the network of club branches and presence in key cities of the country
Create a strong ALTIUS brand ‚Äî recognized in Moldova and beyond
Build a sustainable ecosystem of partners, sponsors and educational programs

2025.title: Scaling Start and Systematization
points: Conduct internal club audit: strengths, needs, infrastructure
Develop and implement unified training methodology for all ages
Create Altius Academy ‚Äî educational program for children and coaches
Launch 2‚Äì3 regional badminton popularization programs (masterclasses, open days)
Start annual Super Liga Altius with rating system and final awards

2026.title: Growth and Regional Expansion
points: Open branches or partner schools in 2 new cities
Organize the first international youth tournament under ALTIUS brand
Launch online platform with training materials and workouts
Create promotion and marketing team (content, social media, website, PR)
Start cooperation with 3‚Äì5 schools and sports centers across the country

2027.title: National Leadership
points: Altius becomes the main training center for the national team
Conducting series of national tournaments under club brand
Creating scouting system: regular selection of talented children across the country
Launch 'Badminton in Every School' program ‚Äî implementing sections in educational institutions
Formation of the first professional club team for international leagues

2028.title: International Recognition
points: Regular participation of club athletes in international tournaments and European youth championships
Organization of own international tournament in Chisinau
Creation of training base with infrastructure for camps
Development of internship and experience exchange program with European clubs and federations

2029.title: Sustainability and Influence Stage
points: Altius ‚Äî main badminton center of Moldova with branches in 5+ cities
Graduation of first European/World champion athletes
Formation of own coaching center and certification program
Reaching cooperation level with international federations and brands
Altius becomes not just a club, but a full-fledged academy and national-scale brand

marketing.title: Marketing and Brand
points: Create unique style and positioning of ALTIUS as a symbol of growth and strength
Maintain active social media presence, publishing athlete achievements, success stories and useful tips
Launch club merchandise line (uniforms, accessories, equipment)
Create inspiring content: videos, interviews, mini-documentaries about athletes
Organize club celebrations and events for parents, partners and athletes

partnerships.title: Partnerships and Sustainability
points: Establish strategic partnerships with badminton federation, schools and universities
Attract corporate sponsors from sports and education sectors
Implement membership and subscription model for stable income
Seek grants and international sports support programs

results.title: Expected Results by 2030
points: More than 2000 active athletes in the club system
Presence in 5+ cities and creation of own training base
Club athletes participate and win at European and World championships
Coach training program and own academy
Sustainable community of parents, coaches, partners and alumni
Altius becomes the #1 brand in Moldova badminton and a well-known club in Eastern Europe

strategy.closing: Altius 2030 is not just a club. It's a movement that grows champions, creates community and shapes the future of badminton in the country.
